job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtA Software Engineer  contract job is available through Modis This is an opportunity to work with worlds largest search engine The position is based out of Cambridge MA but it will be remote for nowltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtThe offered W2 pay rate is 90hourltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for 1 SWE to maintain and perform required upgrades to mobile apps starting in Q3 2021 with an initial term of 9 months The maintenance and upgrades required fall into 3 buckets 1 Ongoing maintenance including stability bug triage alert monitoring and release mechanics 2 Platform ampamp infrastructure taxes internal Google infrastructure migrations and new platformsintegrations to support and 3 Policy ampamp compliance changes The 9 month term covers both rampup time and the work requiredltpgtltpgtSkillExperienceEducationltpgtltpgtMandatoryltpgtltpgt Mobile applications  Java  Experience working on consumerfacing products  Mobile app architecture knowledge of user interface frameworks application design and complex reactive UI frameworksltpgtltpgtDesiredltpgtltpgt Kotlin experience  Web frontend with JavascriptTypescript experience  Full stack experience with debugging monitoring User Interface andor Web FrameworksltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf you are interested in this Software Engineer job opportunity then please click APPLY NOW For other opportunities available at Modis go to wwwmodiscom If you have questions about the position please contact Nishu Lal at nishulalmodiscomltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtEqual Opportunity Employer MinoritiesWomenVeteransDisabledltpgt
